resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106996</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106996</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201865</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">ESL: English Vocabulary Exercises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ESL: Englische Wortschatz-Übungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ESL : Exercices Anglais de Vocabulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ESL: Exercícios Ingleses Do Vocabulário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ESL: Esercitazioni Inglesi Di Vocabolario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ESL: Αγγλικές ασκήσεις λεξιλογίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ESL: Ejercicios Ingleses Del Vocabulario</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The module contains the following exercises: Exercise 1---Listen and unscramble the word; Exercise 2---Listen and spell the word; Exercise 3---Read and match the pairs with similar usage; Exercise 4---Read and find one to fill in the blank in the sentence. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Modul enthält die folgenden Übungen: 
Üben Sie 1---Listen aus und unscramble das Wort; Üben 
Sie 2---Listen aus und buchstabieren Sie das Wort; Üben Sie 
3---Read aus und bringen Sie die Paare mit ähnlichem Verbrauch 
zusammen; Üben Sie 4---Read aus und finden Sie ein, um das 
Leerzeichen im Programmsatz auszufüllen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le module contient les exercices suivants : 
Exercez 1---Listen et déchiffrez le mot ; Exercez 
2---Listen et orthographiez le mot ; Exercez 3---Read et 
appariez les paires avec l'utilisation semblable ; Exercez 
4---Read et trouvez un pour compléter le blanc dans la phrase.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O módulo contem os seguintes exercícios: 
Exercite 1---Listen e unscramble a palavra; Exercite 
2---Listen e soletre a palavra; Exercite 3---Read e combine os 
pares com o uso similar; Exercite 4---Read e encontre um para 
preencher o espaço em branco na sentença.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il modulo contiene le seguenti esercitazioni: 
Eserciti 1---Listen ed unscramble la parola; Eserciti 
2---Listen ed ortografi la parola; Eserciti 3---Read ed abbini 
gli accoppiamenti con uso simile; Eserciti 4---Read e trovi uno 
per riempire lo spazio in bianco nella frase.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ενότητα περιέχει τις ακόλουθες ασκήσεις: Η 
άσκηση 1-ακούει και unscramble η λέξη  Η άσκηση 2-ακούει
και συλλαβίζει τη λέξη  Ασκήστε διαβασμένος και ταιριάξτε 
με τα ζευγάρια την παρόμοια χρήση  Ασκήστε διαβασμένος και 
βρείτε έναν για να συμπληρώσετε το κενό στην πρόταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El módulo contiene los ejercicios siguientes: 
Ejercite 1---Listen y descifre la palabra; Ejercite 
2---Listen y deletree la palabra; Ejercite 3---Read y 
corresponda con los pares con uso similar; Ejercite 4---Read y 
encuentre uno para completar el espacio en blanco en la sentencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106996</entry>
